author: Football Italia Staff
description: Uruguay named their squad for the friendly against Italy on June 7, including Matias Vecino, Diego Laxalt, Edinson Cavani and Luis Suarez.
title: Uruguay squad for Italy friendly

author: BBC Sport
description: Former MotoGP champion Nicky Hayden is injured as a result of an accident while cycling in Italy.
title: Nicky Hayden: Ex-MotoGP champion in hospital after cycling accident in Italy

author: Alessandra Potenza
description: ‘This is shit in Italy not ragù.’
title: My spirit lives in this Twitter account of Italians pissed off at bad food recipes

author: Football Italia Staff
description: Reports in Italy suggest Tottenham Hotspur and Watford are interested in Inter centre-back Jeison Murillo.
title: Spurs want Murillo

author: Football Italia Staff
description: Reports in Italy suggest Tottenham Hotspur and Watford are interested in Inter centre-back Jeison Murillo.
title: Spurs want Murillo

author: Football Italia Staff
description: Juventus President Andrea Agnelli says “Italy must aim to return to the top of world football”.
title: Agnelli: ‘Serie A must recover’

author: John von Radowitz
description: Finland, Sweden, Spain and Italy all have similar systems to the NHS but score better than the UK
title: The UK's place in the world healthcare league table shows we lag behind Europe

author: Reuters
description: Trump leaves for Saudi Arabia on Friday afternoon and will make stops next week in Israel, Belgium and Italy.
title: Seeking A New Narrative, Trump Heads To Middle East And Europe

author: Football Italia Staff
description: Gonzalo Higuain spoke of his youth, surviving meningitis and having football in the blood. “Italy is most similar to Argentina.”
title: Higuain: 'I survived meningitis'

author: Football Italia Staff
description: Chelsea offered £55m (€64m) to bring Marco Verratti from Paris Saint-Germain, but the Italy star is also wanted by Juventus, Inter and Milan.
title: Chelsea bid €64m for Verratti
